oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.util

Class ConfigParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.util.ConfigParams

  • public final class ConfigParams
extends java.lang.Object

    Contains names of common job configuration parameters used by different components of the API

    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BUFFER_ARCT
      The arc tolerance for geodetic arc densification.
      static java.lang.String BUFFER_IFLAT
      The Flattening from CS parameters.
      static java.lang.String BUFFER_SMA
      The Semi Major Axis for the Datum used in the CS of the input.
      static java.lang.String BUFFER_WIDTH
      The buffer width used in buffering operations
      static java.lang.String DATA_SET_INPUT_STR 
      static java.lang.String DATA_SET_LENGTH 
      static java.lang.String DATA_SET_PATH 
      static java.lang.String DATA_SET_TYPE 
      static java.lang.String GEODETIC
      Whether the current geometries can be considered geodetic or not
      static java.lang.String HIERARCHY_INFO_CLASS
      The current HierarchyInfo class implementation.
      static java.lang.String HIERARCHY_LOAD_MAX_LEVEL
      The maximum hierarchy level that should be loaded.
      static java.lang.String HIERARCHY_LOAD_MIN_LEVEL
      The minimum hierarchy level that should be loaded.
      static java.lang.String HIERARCHY_SEARCH_MULTIPLE_LEVELS
      Tells whether spatial searches must performed only in the maximum level loaded (false) or if the search should continue in lower level numbers (or upper levels if the hierarchy is thought as a tree)
      static java.lang.String INPUT_FORMAT 
      static java.lang.String INTERNAL_INPUT_FORMAT
      Input format class used to read input data
      static java.lang.String PARTITIONING_RESULT
      The path of a partitioning result file.
      static java.lang.String RECORD_INFO_INCLUDE_PATH_FIELD
      Whether the RecordInfo path property should be set with the current split path when creating a record info
      static java.lang.String RECORD_INFO_PROVIDER
      Implementing class of RecordInfoProvider
      static java.lang.String SAMPLING_RATIO
      When sampling, this parameter indicates the ratio of the sample size to the input size
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_BOUNDARIES
      The boundaries which the the job's geometries should be into
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_DIMENSIONS
      The dimensions number of the job's geometries
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_INDEX_EXTRA_FIELD_NAMES
      Extra field names contained in the index metadata
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_INDEX_LOCATION
      The location (as a path) of a spatial index
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_INDEX_MAP_FILE
      Boolean configuration parameter that when set to false during a spatial index generation, causes the index to be generated as a sequence file instead of a map file
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_INDEX_METADATA_DIR
      The path to the folder where the metadata for the spatial indices are stored
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_INDEX_NAME
      A spatial index name
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_INDEX_OVERWRITE_METADATA
      Whether the metadata file should be overwriten when generating an index
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_OPERATION
      The current spatial operation as the ordinal of any value defined in SpatialOperation.
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_QUERY_WINDOW
      The query window used along with the current SPATIAL_OPERATION.
      static java.lang.String SPATIAL_TOLERANCE
      The tolerance used when performing spatial operations
      static java.lang.String SRID
      The current SRS ID
      static java.lang.String TMP_HDFS_PATHS
      HDFS path that can be used as temporary folder

      • HIERARCHY_LOAD_MAX_LEVEL

        public static final java.lang.String HIERARCHY_LOAD_MAX_LEVEL
        The maximum hierarchy level that should be loaded. By the default the maximum hierarchy level to be loaded is determined by HierarchyInfo.getNumberOfLevels()
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HIERARCHY_LOAD_MIN_LEVEL

        public static final java.lang.String HIERARCHY_LOAD_MIN_LEVEL
        The minimum hierarchy level that should be loaded. By default the minimum hierarchy level to be loaded is 1.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HIERARCHY_SEARCH_MULTIPLE_LEVELS

        public static final java.lang.String HIERARCHY_SEARCH_MULTIPLE_LEVELS
        Tells whether spatial searches must performed only in the maximum level loaded (false) or if the search should continue in lower level numbers (or upper levels if the hierarchy is thought as a tree)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Constant Field Values

      • SPATIAL_QUERY_WINDOW

        public static final java.lang.String SPATIAL_QUERY_WINDOW
        The query window used along with the current SPATIAL_OPERATION. The geometry is expected to be in GeoJson format.
